title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 421.7 - Oversee service provider arrangements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 421.7 - Oversee service provider arrangements

State Regulations

The licensee: (a) exercises appropriate due diligence in selecting its service providers; and
(b) requires its service providers to implement appropriate measures designed to meet the objectives of this Part, and, where indicated by the licensee's risk assessment, takes appropriate steps to confirm that its service providers have satisfied such obligations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
421.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
